sentence.Network_en: For years, all these strands had been woven through our Indochina policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 多年来我们对印度支那的政策贯穿着这些成份.

sentence.Network_en: Even preserving what we have achieved - the Indochina settlement, for example - would become precarious.
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至保存我们已经取得的成果,例如,印度支那问题的解决, 也会变得极其困难.

sentence.Network_en: None of these conditions was fulfilled in Indochina.
sentence.Network_cn: 在印度支那,这些条件都不具备.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Indochina Wars印度支那战争柬埔寨/老挝/越南
indocalamus 箬竹叶, indochina 中南, indocalamusnakai 箬竹属
为完成天主教广泛的传播,罗德约1619年远赴中南半岛(Indochina),并于1620年抵达河内(越南),加入一个早于1615年已经在当地成立的耶稣会宣教团。当时为越南南北朝时期.

means.word_mean: 1. a peninsula of southeastern Asia that includes Myanmar and Cambodia and Laos and Malaysia and Thailand and Vietnam

auth_sentence.content: Men who served in Indochina often came home to hostility.

auth_sentence.content: This fascinating tour visits all the major sights of Vietnam and Cambodia, the very essence of Indochina.
